src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62939428.cms" /></a>‘Aiyaary’ has an intriguing storyline delivered with measured performances that make it a worthwhile watch, but those expecting the clever Neeraj Pandey twists will probably be left wanting more.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/movie-reviews/aiyaary/articleshow/62939428.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/movie-reviews/aiyaary/articleshow/62939428.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/pics-ajay-devgn-and-kajol-spotted-leaving-a-restaurant-with-kids/photostory/62961316.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62961331.cms" /></a>Ajay Devgn and wife Kajol were spotted leaving a suburban
restaurant on Saturday after lunch along with kids Nysa and Yug.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/pics-ajay-devgn-and-kajol-spotted-leaving-a-restaurant-with-kids/photostory/62961316.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/pics-ajay-devgn-and-kajol-spotted-leaving-a-restaurant-with-kids/photostory/62961316.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 12:30:56 GMT</pubDate><slideid>60272065</slideid></item><item><title>Kareena parties the night away with her BFFs</title><description><a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/pics-kareena-kapoor-khan-parties-the-night-away-with-her-girl-squad/photostory/62960854.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62960874.cms" /></a>Despite her tight schedule, she does make some time to have
a blast with her near and dear ones.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/pics-kareena-kapoor-khan-parties-the-night-away-with-her-girl-squad/photostory/62960854.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/pics-kareena-kapoor-khan-parties-the-night-away-with-her-girl-squad/photostory/62960854.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 11:35:36 GMT</pubDate><slideid>33022870</slideid></item><item><title>Rishi predicts 'huge stardom' for Priya Varrier</title><description><a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/rishi-kapoor-predicts-huge-stardom-for-priya-prakash-varrier-/articleshow/62959551.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62959551.cms" /></a>Veteran actor Rishi Kapoor is impressed by the 'expressive' and 'innocent' Priya Prakash Varrier. He has predicted a bright future for the 18-year-old, who became an internet sensation with a wink and a shy but mischievous smile in a music video.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/rishi-kapoor-predicts-huge-stardom-for-priya-prakash-varrier-/articleshow/62959551.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/rishi-kapoor-predicts-huge-stardom-for-priya-prakash-varrier-/articleshow/62959551.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 09:32:11 GMT</pubDate></item><item><title>'Blackmail' poster: Irrfan strips down to boxers</title><description><a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/blackmail-poster-irrfan-khan-strips-down-to-his-boxers-for-the-black-comedy/photostory/62961189.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62961199.cms" /></a>Irrfan Khan will be next seen in Abhinay Deo’s black comedy
titled 'Blackmail'. After a brief teaser, a new poster of the film has emerged
and Khan has almost bared it all for this one.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/blackmail-poster-irrfan-khan-strips-down-to-his-boxers-for-the-black-comedy/photostory/62961189.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/blackmail-poster-irrfan-khan-strips-down-to-his-boxers-for-the-black-comedy/photostory/62961189.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 12:12:18 GMT</pubDate><slideid>60175744</slideid></item><item><title>Virat credits wife Anushka for his ODI win</title><description><a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/virat-kohli-credits-wife-anushka-sharma-for-his-odi-victory/photostory/62960378.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62960396.cms" /></a>Recently, Virat lead the Indian cricket team to victory
against South Africa. At the post-match interview, he had the most adorable
things to say about his wife.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/virat-kohli-credits-wife-anushka-sharma-for-his-odi-victory/photostory/62960378.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/virat-kohli-credits-wife-anushka-sharma-for-his-odi-victory/photostory/62960378.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 10:50:23 GMT</pubDate><slideid>45105872</slideid></item><item><title>Pic: Purab Kohli weds British girlfriend in Goa</title><description><a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/pic-purab-kohli-ties-the-knot-with-british-girlfriend-lucy-payton-in-goa/photostory/62957211.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62957265.cms" /></a>'Rock
On' actor Purab Kohli is now officially hitched to his longtime girlfriend and
fiancée Lucy Payton who is originally British.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/pic-purab-kohli-ties-the-knot-with-british-girlfriend-lucy-payton-in-goa/photostory/62957211.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/pic-purab-kohli-ties-the-knot-with-british-girlfriend-lucy-payton-in-goa/photostory/62957211.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/kedarnath-row-kriarj-entertainment-releases-an-official-statement-lashes-out-at-director-abhishek-kapoor/photostory/62960632.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62960660.cms" /></a>All is clearly not well with regards to Sara Ali Khan's 17 Feb 2018 11:13:24 GMT</pubDate><slideid>60317892</slideid></item><item><title>Salman turns wildlife explorer on 'Race 3' sets</title><description><a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/watch-salman-khan-turns-wildlife-explorer-on-the-sets-of-race-3/articleshow/62961050.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62961050.cms" /></a>Salman Khan and Jacqueline Fernandez are currently shooting for 'Race 3' in Bangkok. The actor, who is thrilled to be in the scenic location recently shared a video on his Instagram handle of a natural surrounding.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/watch-salman-khan-turns-wildlife-explorer-on-the-sets-of-race-3/articleshow/62961050.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/watch-salman-khan-turns-wildlife-explorer-on-the-sets-of-race-3/articleshow/62961050.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 11:59:11 GMT</pubDate></item><item><title>Mohit Suri not making 'Ek Villain 2'</title><description><a border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62960111.cms" /></a>One of the most controversial parts from Sanjay Leela Bhansali's ‘Padmaavat’ is certainly the iconic Jauhar 17 Feb 2018 10:24:53 GMT</pubDate><slideid>58259105</slideid></item><item><title>SRK turned down 2 film offers by Bhansali?</title><description><a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/shah-rukh-khan-turned-down-two-film-offers-by-sanjay-leela-bhansali/photostory/62959555.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62959566.cms" /></a>According
to reports, Shah Rukh apparently turned down two offers by Sanjay Leela
Bhansali.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/shah-rukh-khan-turned-down-two-film-offers-by-sanjay-leela-bhansali/photostory/62959555.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/shah-rukh-khan-turned-down-two-film-offers-by-sanjay-leela-bhansali/photostory/62959555.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 09:33:50 GMT</pubDate><slideid>27585186</slideid></item><item><title>Kriti Sanon's pictures you shouldn't miss</title><description><a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/kriti-sanons-pictures-you-shouldnt-miss/photostory/62897324.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62897365.cms" /></a>Here are a few pictures of Kriti Sanon that you shouldn’t miss.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/kriti-sanons-pictures-you-shouldnt-miss/photostory/62897324.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/photo-features/kriti-sanons-pictures-you-shouldnt-miss/photostory/62897324.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 13 Feb 2018 06:14:07 GMT</pubDate><slideid>62897180</slideid></item><item><title>'Aiyaary' box-office Day 1</title><description><a href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/aiyaary-box-office-day-1-sidharth-malhotra-manoj-bajpayee-starrer-opens-at-an-estimated-rs-3-25-crore/articleshow/62959324.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/62959324.cms" /></a>Neeraj Pandey is back with yet another gripping crime thriller 'Aiyaary', which got positive reviews from the critics. However, the film, starring Sidharth Malhotra and Manoj Bajpayee as army officials, registered a low opening of around Rs 3.25 crore, as reported by Boxofficeindia.com.</description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/aiyaary-box-office-day-1-sidharth-malhotra-manoj-bajpayee-starrer-opens-at-an-estimated-rs-3-25-crore/articleshow/62959324.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/aiyaary-box-office-day-1-sidharth-malhotra-manoj-bajpayee-starrer-opens-at-an-estimated-rs-3-25-crore/articleshow/62959324.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 09:09:58 GMT</pubDate></item></channel></rss>
